description: This course will focus on the basics of Photoshop. After learning the basics of Photoshop you will be able to do the following: open projects, create new projects, navigate in Photoshop, understand the tools and their capabilities, use layers, use color correction, understand the difference between print & web design, and how to put it all together.  After going through this course, you will have an excellent understanding of how Photoshop works and it will enable you to create, edit, design in photoshop.
title: Photoshop CS6 for Beginners
